text: @APHealthScience @AP No, you should not be using electronic temperature devices on #cats like in the photo to test for #COVID19. #USA #media truly needs editors, which remains main issue in #trust of press. Not every reader has your level of understanding that was a "prop photo."  (and "joke"?) 😾
